Commands.Name: Append Specified Text
Commands.Description: Append the user provided text to the right of the selected text.

Commands.Name: Convert To Camel Case
Commands.Description: Convert text in selection to camel case.

Commands.Name: Convert To Kabob Case
Commands.Description: Convert text in selection to kabob case.

Commands.Name: Convert To Lower Case
Commands.Description: Convert text in selection to lower case.

Commands.Name: Convert To Pascal Case
Commands.Description: Convert the text in selection to pascal case.

Commands.Name: Convert To Proper Case
Commands.Description: Convert text in selection to proper case.

Commands.Name: Convert To Upper Case
Commands.Description: Convert text in selection to upper case.

Commands.Name: Keep First Character
Commands.Description: Returns first character in the active cell.

Commands.Name: Keep First N Characters
Commands.Description: Returns first N characters in the active cell.

Commands.Name: Keep First Word
Commands.Description: Return the first word in the active cell.

Commands.Name: Keep Last Character
Commands.Description: Returns last character in the active cell.

Commands.Name: Keep Last N Characters
Commands.Description: Returns last N characters in the active cell.

Commands.Name: Keep Last Word
Commands.Description: Return the last word in the active cell.

Commands.Name: Keep Nth Word
Commands.Description: Return the Nth word in the active cell (use negatives to count from the end).

Parameters.Name: N
Parameters.Prompt:
Enter N to return Nth word.  Enter an integer or a cell reference.

(Use negatives to count from the end.)

Commands.Name: Keep Text After Specified Text
Commands.Description: Keeps the text right of the first instance of the specified text.

Commands.Name: Keep Text Before Specified Text
Commands.Description: Keeps the text left of the last instance of the specified text.

Commands.Name: Left Trim Spaces
Commands.Description: Removes spaces from start of a text string.

Commands.Name: List Characters
Commands.Description: Spill characters of text in active cell to below.

Commands.Name: List Words
Commands.Description: Spill words of text in active cell to below.

Commands.Name: Prepend Specified Text
Commands.Description: Prepend the user provided text to the left of the selected text.

Commands.Name: Remove First N Characters
Commands.Description: Remove the first N characters of the text in selection.

Parameters.Name: N
Parameters.Prompt: Enter number of characters to remove:

Commands.Name: Remove First N Words
Commands.Description: Removes the first N words from the text in the selection.

Commands.Name: Remove First Word
Commands.Description: Removes the first word from the text in the selection.

Commands.Name: Remove Last N Characters
Commands.Description: Remove the last N characters of the text in selection.

Parameters.Name: N
Parameters.Prompt: Enter number of characters to remove:

Commands.Name: Remove Last N Words
Commands.Description: Removes the last N words from the text in the selection.

Commands.Name: Remove Last Word
Commands.Description: Removes the last word from the text in the selection.

Commands.Name: Remove Specified Text
Commands.Description: Remove specified text from the selection.

Commands.Name: Remove Text After Specified Text
Commands.Description: Removes the text right of the first instance of the specified text.

Commands.Name: Remove Text Before Specified Text
Commands.Description: Removes the text left of the last instance of the specified text.

Commands.Name: Replace Commas With Pipes
Commands.Description: Replace commas with pipes in selected text.

Commands.Name: Replace Commas With Semicolons
Commands.Description: Replace commas with semicolons in selected text.

Commands.Name: Replace Curly Braces With Parenthesis
Commands.Description: Replace curly braces with parenthesis in selected text.

Commands.Name: Replace Curly Braces With Square Brackets
Commands.Description: Replace curly braces with square brackets in selected text.

Commands.Name: Replace Parenthesis With Curly Braces
Commands.Description: Replace parenthesis with curly braces in selected text.

Commands.Name: Replace Parenthesis With Square Brackets
Commands.Description: Replace parenthesis with square brackets in selected text.

Commands.Name: Replace Pipes With Commas
Commands.Description: Replace pipes with commas in selected text.

Commands.Name: Replace Pipes With Semicolons
Commands.Description: Replace pipes with semicolons in selected text.

Commands.Name: Replace Semicolons With Commas
Commands.Description: Replace semicolons with commas in selected text.

Commands.Name: Replace Semicolons With Pipes
Commands.Description: Replace semicolons with pipes in selected text.

Commands.Name: Replace Spaces With Hyphens
Commands.Description: Replace spaces with hyphens in selected text.

Commands.Name: Replace Spaces With Periods
Commands.Description: Replace spaces with periods in selected text.

Commands.Name: Replace Spaces With Underscores
Commands.Description: Replace spaces with underscores in selected text.

Commands.Name: Replace Square Brackets With Curly Braces
Commands.Description: Replace square brackets with curly braces in selected text.

Commands.Name: Replace Square Brackets With Parenthesis
Commands.Description: Replace square brackets with parenthesis in selected text.

Commands.Name: Replace Underscores With Hyphens
Commands.Description: Replace underscores with hyphens in selected text.

Commands.Name: Replace Underscores With Spaces
Commands.Description: Replace underscores with spaces in selected text.

Commands.Name: Right Trim Spaces
Commands.Description: Removes spaces from end of a text string.

Commands.Name: Split By Characters
Commands.Description: Spill characters of text in active cell to the right.

Commands.Name: Split By N Characters
Commands.Description: Spill characters of text in active cell to the right in chunks of length N.

Commands.Name: Split By Words
Commands.Description: Spill words of text in active cell to the right.

Commands.Name: Trim Spaces
Commands.Description: Removes all spaces from a text string except single spaces between words.

Commands.Name: Trim Spaces From End
Commands.Description: Removes spaces from end of a text string.

Commands.Name: Trim Spaces From Start
Commands.Description: Removes spaces from start of a text string.
